classification: Tools, Equipment and Utilitarian Objects; Ceremonial Objects
creditline: Gift of Mr.and Mrs. Augustus L. Searle
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: carved rhinoceros horn libation cup; in form of a lotus leaf; the exterior is decorated in designs of lilies and flowers carved in high relief; the interior is carved to show the numerous veins of the leaf; carved wood base
title: Libation Cup with Base
